Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 32nd overall pick, by Troy in 1951...
Injured on 8/18/1952 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/17/1954 with a Dislocated Finger, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/28/1955 with a Stiff Neck, out for 5 days...
Traded from Troy to Malibu on 4/1/1957 (Going to Mal: CF J. Rodriguez, C T. Deegan, 2B W. Benningfield. Going to TRO: P B. Ross)...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 5/22/1962, off Ernest Phillips (WIS)...
Released by Malibu on 4/1/1963...
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Malibu in 1967...
Injured on 6/16/1967 with a Bruised Ankle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 5/6/1974, off John Heron (NE)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/2/1976, off Augustine Lucero (DIA)...
